lyrics:
14 contributorsthe rain lyricsintro
yeah oh diddy oh diddy ohh

akon konvict konvict
ahahahahh ahahahahh

verse 1
the pressures buildin up oh i feel like givin up oh
how in the fuck am i gonna back my first album up
when everything has changed oh itll never be the same oh
nobody knew me then now everybody knows my name
and i feel so ashamed
i never been the kind of nigga that would complain
but its so crazy man
its no different every day its just the same thing
now its been months out on the road
on tour doin so many different shows
head spinnin feelin like its gonna explode
and i just wanna know
if anybody out theres feelin me
im losin my mind and i cant believe
i let this shit get the best of me
and now i gotta let you know

chorus
whats got me insane
ohh cause i cant stand the rain
ayy its hitting my window pane a little too much
and now i gotta let you know
whats got my face in a frown
ayy cause i cant stand the sound cant stand the sound
ohh the thunder thats crashing down upon my house ayy
cause now i gotta let you know
see akon liveget tickets as low as 84you might also likeverse 2
now i got no more worries now now my pockets fatter now now
look in the mirror my reflection looks different now
youre gettin bigger akon you need to settle down
why do i feel this way
should i be happy or should i just ignore
everything that ive been given please help me lord
its all over but i cant escape the rain
now its been months out on the road
on tour doin so many different shows
head spinnin feelin like its gonna explode
and now i gotta let you know
if anybody out theres feelin me
im losin my mind and i cant believe
i let this shit get the best of me
and now i gotta let you know
